show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: Nicole Foss Of The Automatic Earth Gives An Appraisal

title: Nicole Foss Of The Automatic Earth Gives An Appraisal
content:
A long but very incisive interview with the head of The Automatic Earth blog site. I agree with everything she says. <!--more--> A far-reaching survey of her opinions on many matters pertaining to the future.
This is a first for me – the longest interview the Wake-Up Call has ever transmitted.
Well worth your while.
A brief comment (from me) on America’s decision to ‘kick the can down the road’ on the debt ceiling and related issues.
A truly pathetic spectacle.
Update on the TPP.
Inequality in America.
The coming union of the largest European banks in 2014.
Comment from David Stockman.
Anecdotal story about a drunken sheriff’s deputy trying to arrest a female soldier for not reciprocating his advances!
